description: Identifier of the asset or unit associated with this meter replacement.
Code indicating the asset’s class or category; organization-specific mapping; confirm with SME.
Specifies whether the meter tracks distance or operating time.
Sequence number for this asset’s meter replacement entry, distinguishing multiple replacements.
Timestamp when the asset’s meter was replaced or reset.
Reading on the removed meter at replacement time, used to preserve lifetime totals.
Starting reading on the new meter after replacement; likely the reset baseline; confirm with SME.
Most recent reading on the replacement meter recorded in this entry; confirm semantics with SME.
Free-form notes about the meter replacement.
User or process that created this record (e.g., migration job).
User who last modified this record.
Timestamp of the last modification to this record.
